column5: Highway 11 between, 60 km west of Hearst and Longlac is closed.  Hwy 584 just north of Gearlton is closed.  http://www.cbc.ca/beta/news/canada/thunder-bay/geraldton-state-emergency-fires-1.3597038  http://www.tbnewswatch.com/News/389867/Forest_fire_threat_closes_section_of_Highway_584
Hwy 11 between Longlac and Hearst is open.  Hwy 584 just north of Gearlton is  still closed.
Eep...sure hope it's open in a few weeks.   Hope everyone is ok.
17 was closed at White river too Power was out because the fire ate the lines
Yikes!! That's close to where I moose hunt... let's hope it rains soon..
